title: Into the Snow: The Testimony and Last Will of Jedediah P. Carpenter
description: Based on the legend of Silverheels, this novel views events surrounding the early development of the Colorado gold camps through the eyes of Jedediah P. Carpenter, who was orphaned on the Nebraska prairie at the age of sixteen, then finds and loses fortune and love during the great Pikes Peak Gold Rush.
author: John  Erwin
